document.full_text: reconciliation efforts between the taliban and the afghan government lack clarity and need more explanation, u.s. senator john kerry said on sunday, two months before washington plans to begin a gradual troop drawdown.
document.title: afghan peace plan needs better explanation: kerry
lines_and_colors: reconciliation efforts between the taliban and the afghan government lack clarity and need more explanation, u.s. senator john kerry said on sunday, two months before washington plans to begin a gradual troop drawdown.
